title: Cassiopeia Chroma Pack Bug
body: I have this problem, where i have bought the Cassiopeia chroma pack and it is in my purchase history, but i don't have to option to pick my chroma in the lobby screen and i can't even see the locked boxes for the chroma anymore. Please fix?

replies.body: Sorry to be an idiot but the problem actually isnt fixed. In custom queues it is fine but in normal's queue the base skin is called "Desperada Cassiopeia". However when i was testing it in a custom game it worked and i got to use one of the Chroma's colours in game. During the normals game i did not have the option to select a chroma but in-game i was using the chroma i had selected during my custom game test. Also i can't figure out how to put captures onto this comment sorry.
The problem appears to have fixed itself, but thank you anyway.

Hey Miffbuster - 

Thanks for the report! 

Which queue are you in? Would you happen to have a screenshot?
